subject: International Monetary Fund, 7
body:
International Monetary Fund, 700 19th
Street, N.W., Washington, D.C. 20431.
Headquarters 2
Attention
The IMF as the World Funding Unit will significantly notify you on
this decision to cancel your funds and be use for COVID 19 funding for
health purpose since you are been ignorant toward the reclaiming of
your funds which suppose to be important matter to attend to,
Acknowledge that Your funds value the sum of US$6.5 Million Usd will
be release by the Central Bank of Nigeria come Friday by the
instruction and order from the IMF, because of the present issue of
the global meltdown which kept killing people round the globe, world
are experience Economy Meltdown now which agreement has been made by
the Secretary General of the United Nation signed that any Abandon
funds should be release for Health matter, As our duty to verify funds
we are instructing you to contact the Remitting Bank to claim your
funds because by Wednesday the Funds will be release for Treasury
Department. With your info we confirm you are an foreign citizen and
this Funds must be claiming from the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) or
the Funds will be openly Cancel as Funds which you the beneficiary
have refused to finalize the re claiming process via all directive
from the Remitting Bank.
Contacting the Bank now should be your priority because they sincerely
await on your respond as the rightful Beneficiary to claim the
Inheritance funds which value the sum of US$6.5 Million,
Due contact us back with your full details as the following below.
Full Name:
Address:
Direct Cell Phone:
Age:
Occupation:
International Passport
:
Next of Kin's:
CBN Official Website: https/ngcbnonline.com/en
You will be directed to contact the Governor of the CBN Office as the
only assigned person to guide through claiming your Funds from the
Online Offshore Account it has been deposited.
Mrs Kristalina Georgieva
Кристалина Георгиева

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund, 7
body:
Dear Mrs. Kristalina Georgieva,

I am writing in response to your email regarding the release of my funds valued at US Million USD by the Central Bank of Nigeria. I understand that these funds are to be used for health purposes due to the global pandemic.

However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding further. Firstly, could you please provide more details about the process of claiming these funds? Secondly, could you also confirm if there are any fees or charges associated with this process?

Regarding the information you requested, I will provide my passport and next of kin's details once I have received clear instructions from you on how to proceed safely and securely.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Mary
